basic_info.description: I am a Software Engineer with a degree in theoretical mathematics and a background in HR compensation analysis. I have experience working in a fast-paced and dynamic high-tech environment, and excel at collaborating and working on a team. I have a proven track record of communicating the most important details to non-technical audiences, allowing me to better message key takeaways, maintain engagement and facilitate decision making.
basic_info.description_part_two: When I am not coding, I enjoy spending time with my husband, our dog and the rest of our family. I love yoga, the beach, traveling, skiing, logic problems and jigsaw puzzles.

projects.title: The Recipe Box
projects.description: Full-stack recipe application using Vue, Django, Python and PostgreSQL. Front end was developed with Vue, and a Spoonacular API was used to add ingredients to the “pantry”. Search functionality included to allow users to find recipes with a specific ingredient, which required a nested for loop and multiple string and array methods.

projects.title: Great Reads
projects.description: Full-stack PERN application built with 3 other developers. Designed a spin on GoodReads, which allowed users to share their favorite books and add reviews. Backend consisted of 5 associated tables, front end was developed with React Redux for state management, and a Google Books API was used to add books to the site.

projects.title: Wellness While Working From Home
projects.description: Full-stack MERN application with tips and yoga poses to help users focus on self care while working from home. Made RESTful API fetch calls to an Express, MongoDB, Node.js backend handling all create, read, update, delete (CRUD) operations, and tested all backend routes during development using Insomnia.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: With just two weeks of coding experience, created a 16-card memory game utlizing HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Used conditional statements, for loops, DOM manipulation and event listeners.
